Title: Our Children, Ourselves
Plot: Phil and Claire pressure Alex to ease back on her school work, but begin to worry about their own intellectual drives. Jay is upset when Gloria tries to befriend a new couple, and Mitchell runs into an old female flame.
GuestStars: Adam Kulbersh, Ajay Mehta, Anjali Bhimani, Mark Povinelli, Mary Lynn Rajskub, Stephnie Weir
